Correction: ASO Author Reflections: How Does Cholestasis Worsen Pancreatic Cancer Progression?
Joy Sarkar, MD1 , and Kazuaki Takabe, MD1,2,3,4,5,6
1Department of Surgical Oncology, Roswell Park Cancer Institute, Buffalo, NY; 2Division of Surgical Oncology, Department of Surgery, Virginia Commonwealth University School of Medicine and Massey Cancer Center, Richmond, VA; 3Department of Surgery, University at Buffalo Jacob School of Medicine and Biomedical Sciences, The State University of New York, Buffalo, NY; 4Department of Surgery, Niigata University Graduate School of Medical and Dental Sciences, Niigata, Japan; 5Department of Breast Surgery and Oncology, Tokyo Medical University, Tokyo, Japan; 6Department of Surgery, Yokohama City University, Yokohama, Japan
Correction to: Ann Surg Oncol (2022) 30:1642–1643 https:// doi. org/ 10. 1245/ s10434- 022- 12946-7
In the original online version of this article there were multiple funding grants noted. This article received no funding.
The original article was corrected.
